messages.content: Dear The Taylor Family, Earlier this year, I left the Conservative Party because it had shifted beyond recognition. It is now in the grip of its right-wing and has no room for moderate views. It has also abandoned any serious commitment to tackling burning injustices.

messages.title: I just couldn't stay with the Conservative Party.
messages.content: Its relentless determination to push ahead with Brexit, no matter what the cost, has divided the country and put so much at risk. Urgent problems - like climate change, widening inequality, the lack of affordable housing and our overstretched NHS - have been neglected.

messages.title: That's why earlier this year, like 26,000 others in the last 6 months, I joined the Liberal Democrats.
messages.content: Under Jo Swinson, a Liberal Democrat government will create a shared vision for the country we want to be, where every single person and community is valued, empowered and cared for, and where we protect our planet for future generations.

messages.title: The Liberal Democrats will reinvent the relationship between business and the communities in which they operate.
messages.content: so that they are a part of the solution to our biggest challenges, not the problem.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats aim to stop Brexit.
Tackling urgent problems like climate change.
Resolving the lack of affordable housing.

issues.brexitEurope: Its relentless determination to push ahead with Brexit, no matter what the cost, has divided the country.
issues.environment: Urgent problems - like climate change - have been neglected.
issues.health: Our overstretched NHS has been neglected.

housing.content: The lack of affordable housing has been neglected.

leaflet.personalStatement: Earlier this year, I left the Conservative Party because it had shifted beyond recognition.
leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. If Remainers come together, we can combat the hatred and division at the extremes of the Conservative and Labour parties. We can build a brighter future.
